item.description:
Let's meet at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub for the sixth regular season game. Last week all three parts of the Bears showed up and the demolished the Vikings.  Hopefully they can have a similar performance in London,  so come on out and cheer on your Bears!

About the Courtside Restaurant and Pub

Courtside Restaurant and Pub have 12 HD TV's and they have the NFL SUNDAY TICKET. They seat over 200 people.

http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/

Menu:

http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/menu.htm

Directions:

Courtside Restaurant and Pub is located 2 blocks from Leachmere T Station. They also have free parking in their lot. http://www.courtsidekaraoke.com/map.htm
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign,

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Week 7 Football: Bears @ Buccaneers (London)
